messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling in Italy (military)
messages.msgSnippet: Lisa, I have first hand experience in Greece.  There are only a handful of families here that are homeschooling and even fewer unschooling.  I think you¹ll
messages.messageBody:
Lisa,

I have first hand experience in Greece. There are only a handful of
families here that are homeschooling and even fewer unschooling. I think
you¹ll find that there are lots of homeschooling families in Italy, and
people will have at least heard of it ;)

Still, there may be some similarities between the two countries. Please
feel free to contact me privately if you need some support.

When are you moving?

Vida
www.aegean-villas.com
www.paintinggreece.com





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: Unschooling in Italy (military)
messages.msgSnippet: What are you looking for?  Legal stuff, fun things to do, un/homeschooling groups? I don t have any experience with Italy, in particular, but we did live in
messages.messageBody:
What are you looking for? Legal stuff, fun things to do,
un/homeschooling groups?

I don't have any experience with Italy, in particular, but we did
live in Germany and Turkey as a military family. If there's
anything you want to ask, just ask :)

-Christy M.

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "LR" <zanyzingzap@...>
wrote:

military

would

messages.subject: Unschooling in Italy (military)
messages.msgSnippet: We are moving to Italy. Does anyone have direct experience with unschooling (in the military particularly) in Italy? I am of course going to search the net but
messages.messageBody:
We are moving to Italy.

Does anyone have direct experience with unschooling (in the military
particularly) in Italy? I am of course going to search the net but would
like to know if someone has first hand experience.



Thanks

Lisa
